attributes.background: Theresa May has said over 108 times the UK would depart the EU on 29/03/19. This was law. She has broken that promise to the British people. She has had nearly 3 years to organise our departure from the EU and has failed. She has lost control of her government and the confidence of the electorate.

rejection.details: The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
